name: interview-app
description: The following local minikube must be installed on an amd/64 architecture device, to follow the standardize the same architecture across Azure and github actions (github actions build images using amd64) or you will be getting ImagePullBackoff Checkout how to install minikube for local cluster: https://minikube.sigs.k8s.io/docs/start/?arch=%2Fmacos%2Farm64%2Fstable%2Fbinary+download * Ensure that your Docker Daemon is also installed and running from https://www.docker.com/products/docker-desktop/, then run the following command to start the clusterm this will also enable the `kubectl` CLI: * Also ensure that helm is installed: https://helm.sh/docs/intro/install/
